thread.section_title: LeaversHoodies.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.leavershoodies.com
thread.title: Ngaio

author: Ngaio
title: Ngaio
text: The entire process from my initial enquiry with a design to production and delivery was amazing. I always received helpful email responses very quickly from Anna, who was very informative about all my different options for clothing garments, designs, customisation, prices and sizing, and she made sure that everything was exactly as I wanted it to be without over-complicating the whole process! The online shop option was perfect for us as a University society as it eliminated the need for us to collect money and orders so made everything even quicker. We received the products earlier this week and they are exactly as I imagined and are perfect for our society - everyone who ordered was very happy with what they received and I have no doubt that each item is of a high quality and will last well. I have already recommended College Custom (Leavers Hoodies) to a few friends and we will definitely be using them for any future products for our society.
